Package com.simplechat.protocol

Class Summary
ClientData Container for data about a client.
Packet Default packet class, superclass of all packets.
Packet0KeepAlive Keep alive packet, sent to keep client connect to server.
Packet1Join Join packet, sent by client upon joining the server.
Packet2Leave Leave packet, sent by client upon client-side leave operation.
Packet3Chat Chat packet, sent by client when a message is entered.
Packet4Kick Kick packet, sent by server to kick a client.
Packet5Message Message packet, sent by server to relay a message to a client.
Packet6NameChange Name change packet, sent by server to change a client's name.
Packet7Handshake Handshake packet, sent by server to tell client it's connected.
Packet8PasswordChange Password change packet, sent by server to change a client's password.
PacketHandler Handler for sending out packets.
 

Enum Summary
PacketType Holds packet type enums, used for checking packet type.
